pageProduct.description:
General Information

Exclusive Hydrating Gel Reservoir that hydrates throughout each shave – delivering 40% less friction than a lube strip**

Common Uses

A larger, redesigned guardbar and reduced blade spans help smooth your skin and reduce irritation
